room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Amaze Room Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: We had SO much fun. We did prison break and it was the perfect amount of challenging. If I lived in the area I would definitely be back. Great place to go on rainy days.

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Amaze Room Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: My girlfriend and I had a great time escaping the Prison Break room! We loved the unique start to the game, and found the puzzles to be challenging but exciting. The staff is friendly, helpful and overall great people! We were here while on vacation, but will definitely return to escape the other rooms while on our next vacation!

room_title: Escape room "Prison Break" by Amaze Room Escapes in Raleigh - Durham
review: We drove almost 3 hours to get here and it was well worth it. The puzzles were challenging; yet fun. We escaped from both rooms, but Prison break was by far our favorite one. Sam and Vince were great too!
